project.name: DemoDistributionBuilder
project.description: Ant task to create a demo distribution.

target.name: run
target.depends: prepare, createPlanFile, downloadCore, downloadAD, downloadBD, downloadBP, downloadMM, downloadHR, downloadSD, copy, pack

target.name: prepare
target.echo: Copying application libraries to the build/lib folder...

target.name: createPlanFile
target.echo: Creating the plan file for core...

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <plan name="nan21.dnet.core.plan" version="${dnetVersion}" scoped="false" atomic="true" xmlns="http://www.eclipse.org/virgo/schema/plan" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation=" http://www.eclipse.org/virgo/schema/plan http://www.eclipse.org/virgo/schema/plan/eclipse-virgo-plan.xsd">
<artifact type="configuration" name="net.nan21.dnet" version="0"/> <artifact type="configuration" name="net.nan21.dnet.product" version="0"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.core.api" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.core.db" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.core.domain" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.core.business" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.core.workflow" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.core.presenter" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.core.security" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.core.setup" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"> <property name="header:Web-ContextPath" value="/nan21.dnet.core.setup" /> </artifact> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.core.web" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"> <property name="header:Web-ContextPath" value="/nan21.dnet.core.web" /> </artifact> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.core.welcome" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"> <property name="header:Web-ContextPath" value="/nan21.dnet.core.welcome" /> </artifact> <artifact type="bundle" name="net.nan21.osgi.extjs" version="[3.3.0, 3.3.0]" /> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.core.ui.extjs" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"> <property name="header:Web-ContextPath" value="/nan21.dnet.core.ui.extjs" /> </artifact>
</plan>
Creating the plan file for modules...

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <plan name="nan21.dnet.modules.plan" version="${dnetVersion}" scoped="false" atomic="true" xmlns="http://www.eclipse.org/virgo/schema/plan" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation=" http://www.eclipse.org/virgo/schema/plan http://www.eclipse.org/virgo/schema/plan/eclipse-virgo-plan.xsd">
<artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.ad.domain" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.ad.business" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.ad.presenter" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.ad.ui.extjs" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"> <property name="header:Web-ContextPath" value="/nan21.dnet.module.ad.ui.extjs" /> </artifact>
<artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.bd.domain" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.bd.business" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.bd.presenter" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.bd.ui.extjs" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"> <property name="header:Web-ContextPath" value="/nan21.dnet.module.bd.ui.extjs" /> </artifact>
<artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.bp.domain" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.bp.business" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.bp.presenter" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.bp.ui.extjs" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"> <property name="header:Web-ContextPath" value="/nan21.dnet.module.bp.ui.extjs" /> </artifact>
<artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.mm.domain" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.mm.business" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.mm.presenter" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.mm.ui.extjs" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"> <property name="header:Web-ContextPath" value="/nan21.dnet.module.mm.ui.extjs" /> </artifact>
<artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.hr.domain" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.hr.business" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.hr.presenter" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.hr.ui.extjs" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"> <property name="header:Web-ContextPath" value="/nan21.dnet.module.hr.ui.extjs" /> </artifact>
<artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.sd.domain" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.sd.business" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.sd.presenter" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"/> <artifact type="bundle" name="nan21.dnet.module.sd.ui.extjs" version="[${dnetVersion}, ${dnetVersion}]"> <property name="header:Web-ContextPath" value="/nan21.dnet.module.sd.ui.extjs" /> </artifact>
</plan>

target.name: copy
target.echo: Copying core artifacts to virgo repository/usr...
Copying module artifacts to virgo repository/usr...
Copying core artifacts to the build/artifacts folder...
Copying module artifacts to the build/artifacts folder...

target.name: downloadCore
target.echo: Downloading DNet-Core artifacts from maven repository...
